title: Subway Tile Backsplashes, Quartz Countertops, Walk-In Closets
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 707 Sq.
Time to stop looking and start moving!
Located in the heart of the quirky, vibrant goodness that is downtown Las Vegas, Fremont9 is an apartment community that knows how to work hard and play even harder.
Settle in, this is going to be fun.
Of course, we have the standards like stainless appliances, quartz countertop, and wood-style plank, but you'll flip for the more unexpected details in our floor plans.
Think gas appliances, LED under-cabinet lighting
You can't fake this kind of cool.
The Container Park filled with goodness.
A hop, skip and jump in either direction?

Modern Floor Plans, Wood-Style Plank Flooring, Contemporary Flat-Panel Cabinets With LED Lighting, Walk-In Closets, Pet-Friendly Community, Quartz Countertops, Natural Gas and Energy Star® Stainless Steel Appliances, Washer/Dryer, Subway Tile Backsplashes

Media Lounge with Video Wall, 24/7 On-Demand Parcel Lockers, Outdoor Courtyards with Ping Pong and Fire Pits, 24-Hour Fitness Center with Reclaimed Gym Floors, Entertainment Kitchen and Community Dining Space, BBQ Grills, Bicycle Storage, Fully-Equipped Conference Room, Resort-Style Pool and Spa, TopBrewer App-Powered Espresso Machine, Chic Spaces with Handpainted Murals and Blackened Steel Accents, Clubroom Lounge with Billiards and Music Wall, Yoga and Spin Studio
Maximum of two pets allowed per apartment.
A one-time fee of $350 will be charged in addition to pet rent of $35 per month, per pet.
